text: Grégoire Saucy (born 29 December 1999) is a Swiss racing driver currently driving for ART Grand Prix in the 2020 Formula Renault Eurocup Championship. ==Career== ===V de V Challenge Monoplace=== Saucy's first year in single seaters was in 2016 when he drove for Luxembourger team RC Formula in the V de V Challenge Monoplace. The 3 podiums Saucy scored on his way to 4th in the championship were all 2nd places in the 3 races at Circuit de Nevers Magny- Cours.https://web.archive.org/web/20170304035944/http://www.vdev.fr/datas/media/583e934241e882485c8b4573/2016-monoplace.pdf ===ADAC Formula 4=== Saucy raced his first season in ADAC Formula 4 in 2018 where he raced as a guest driver for Jenzer Motorsport like he did the year previously in the Italian F4 championship. In the two races he raced he finished 11th and 5th. In 2019 he raced for R-ace GP where he finished on the podium 2 times, Saucy ended the season in 9th, 28 points behind his Russian teammate Mikhael Belov.http://www.automobilsport.com/race-categories--24/race- categories--24,189091,Talented-youngsters-on-the-way-up-Fifth-season-of-ADAC- Formula-4-about-to-get-underway,news.htm ===Italian Formula 4=== Jenzer Motorsport signed Saucy to race for them 2017 as a guest driver in the Italian F4 Championship. In the 6 races he partook in, Saucy finished in points scoring positions twice both at Mugello Circuit. In 2018 Saucy once again raced Jenzer until the final race of the season where he made the switch to the French team R-ace GP, his best result was 5th while he also scored a double pole position at round 3 in Monza. Following on from the last race of 2018, Saucy drove for R-ace GP in 2019 where he finished the season in 15th while only competing in 3 rounds.http://www.acisport.it/public/2019/pdf/F4/2019_2468Vallelunga//Elenco_verificati_vallelunga_05052019_verificati_if4c.pdf ===Formula Renault Eurocup=== Saucy's first year in Formula Renault was in 2017 when he raced for AVF by Adrian Valles. Saucy raced in the final two rounds in the 2019 Formula Renault Eurocup season for R-ace GP where he finished 5th in his first race and 12th in the next 3. In 2020 Saucy will race for ART Grand Prix alongside Paul Aron and Victor Martins.http://www.art- grandprix.com/news/gr%C3%A9goire-saucy-joins-art-grand-prix-2020-formula- renault-campaign ==Racing record== ===Career summary=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align:center" |- !
